resources.name: Submit For Auth Token
resources.description: Request an access token

resources.name: Swagger - Insomnia Financing API Import File
resources.description: Mosaic public api

resources.name: Get Disclosures
resources.description: Get a disclosures bundle

resources.name: Submit Application For Credit
resources.description: Create an application and immediately submit it for decisioning.

body.text:
{
	"applicants": [
		{
			"firstName": "{% prompt 'First Name', 'First Name', 'Test', '', false, true %}",
			"middleName": "{% prompt 'Middle name', '', '', '', false, true %}",
			"lastName": "{% prompt 'Last Name', 'Last Name', 'Test', '', false, true %}",
			"dateOfBirth": "{{ _.dateOfBirth }}",
			"socialSecurityNumber": "{% prompt 'UNIQUE SSN (9 numbers)', 'SSN', '', '', false, true %}",
			"annualIncome": "3600",
			"emailAddress": "{% prompt 'Email Address', 'Email Address', 'test', '', false, true %}@joinmosaic.com",
			"phoneNumber": "{% prompt 'Phone number', '', '+18557467849', '', false, true %}",
			"language": "{% prompt 'Language', '', 'en', '', false, true %}",
			"addresses": [
				{
					"street": "{{ _.street }}",
					"city": "{{ _.city }}",
					"stateAbbreviation": "{{ _.stateAbbreviation }}",
					"zipCode": "{{ _.zipCode }}",
					"residenceType": "Primary",
					"addressTags": [
						"Rental", "Mailing"
					]
				}
			],
			"applicantType": "Primary"
		}
	],
	"externalId": "externalInstallerId",
	"disclosuresBundleId": "{% response 'body', 'req_wrk_4762fb5d55084d29b3185b2fd4a5220667d61fd3', 'b64::JC5idW5kbGVJZA==::46b', 'never', 60 %}",
	"salesRepExternalIdentifier": "{{ _.salesRepExternalIdentifier }}"
}

body.text:
{
	"applicants": [
		{
			"firstName": "{% prompt 'First Name', 'First Name', 'Test', '', false, true %}",
			"middleName": "{% prompt 'Middle name', '', '', '', false, true %}",

			"annualIncome": "151113",
			"otherHouseholdIncome": "10000",
			"emailAddress": "{% prompt 'Email Address', 'Email Address', 'test', '', false, true %}@joinmosaic.com",
			"phoneNumber": "{% prompt 'Phone number', '', '+18557467849', '', false, true %}",

	"disclosuresBundleId": "{% response 'body', 'req_6b176db794014869a4d8ff67b5491829', 'b64::JC5idW5kbGVJZA==::46b', 'never', 60 %}",

body.text:
{
	"applicants": [
		{
			"firstName": "{% prompt 'First Name', 'First Name', 'Test', '', false, true %}",
			"middleName": "{% prompt 'Middle name', '', 'J', '', false, true %}",
			"lastName": "{% prompt 'Last Name', 'Last Name', 'Test', '', false, true %}",
			"dateOfBirth": "{{ _.dateOfBirth }}",
			"socialSecurityNumber": "{% prompt 'UNIQUE SSN (9 numbers)', 'SSN', '', '', false, true %}",
			"annualIncome": "151113",
			"otherHouseholdIncome": "10000",
			"emailAddress": "{% prompt 'Email Address', 'Email Address', 'test', '', false, true %}@joinmosaic.com",
			"phoneNumber": "{% prompt 'Phone number', '', '+18557467849', '', false, true %}",
			"language": "en",
			"addresses": [
				{
					"street": "{{ _.street }}",
					"city": "{{ _.city }}",
					"stateAbbreviation": "{{ _.stateAbbreviation }}",
					"zipCode": "{{ _.zipCode }}",
					"residenceType": "Primary",
					"addressTags": [
						"Rental", "Mailing"
					]
				}
			],
			"applicantType": "Primary"
		}
	],
	"externalId": "externalAggregatorId",
	"disclosuresBundleId": "{{ _.disclosureBundleId }}",
	"partnerIdentifier": "{% prompt 'Partner Identifier', 'Partner Identifier', 'amsunsolar', '', false, true %}",
	"salesRepExternalIdentifier": "{{ _.salesRepExternalIdentifier }}"
}
